Nice to Meet you!

Please connect with me through social media!

Zach Corpuz

Seattle, WA

I am an experienced Senior Manager that has made a pivot in my career to pursue Full Stack Engineering. I am currently attending the Full Stack Engineering course at UCLA Extension and will be graduating this Sept of 2020. After graduation, I believe that my previous professional experience combined with the knowledge that I obtain from this course will allow me to make an immediate impact in my future positions. This course has given me the knowledge to work with technologies such as HTML, Javascript, jQuery, MySQL, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, React, and a few more. I am very eager to continue my learning of engineering as this industry is always changing while contributing to an engineering team at a high level.

Soma Kitchen LA

Deployed Website

Soma Kitchen is a catering company located in Los Angeles. They had a website with no functionality. The owners wanted a website that allowed customers to engage with their products and services without having to reach out to them via phone or social media. We implemented several web APIs that allowed clients to order from their online menu, book private events, and pay for whatever products or services they have chose. We also utilized a MySQL database to keep track of previous, current, and inquiring customers.

  • Live Link: Soma Kitchen
  • Technologies Used: Handlebars.js, CSS, Node.js, Express, MySQL, Sequelize ORM, Square API, Google Calendar API

Law Offices of Theodore Behlendorf

Deployed Website

With no existing website, we were tasked to create a website that would increase their online presence. We wanted to work with a few web APIs that would give their website a little more interaction and say a little bit more of what type of Law they specialize in. We utilized a Twitter API to have a live timeline about Immigration Law. In the footer, we used an OpenLayers API to show the locaiton of their law firm.

  • Live Link: Law Office
  • Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Materialize, jQuery, Twitter API, OpenLayers API, SmptJS

Weather Dashboard

Application

Created a weather dashboard that would takes in a user input of any city in the world. After the input is received, the dashboard will display the current weather and gives you a 5 day forecast. The application utilizes JSON format to give you all the information that you need. As the user inputs more cities, all the previous searches will be stored and displayed on the left hand side of the application.

  • Live Link: Weather Dashboard
  • Technologies Used: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, OpenWeather API, Moment.js

Employee Tracker

Application

I created this application that allows a business owner to view and manage the departments, roles, and employees in their company. The paplication utilizes the Inquirer package that gives them full access of the CRUD operations for their business. The database is MySQL and we used cTable which is an NPM package that displays the data we want in a readable format.

  • Link to Application Demo: Employee Tracker
  • Technologies Used: Node.js, MySQL, Inquirer, Console.Table

Workout Tracker

Application

I created this workout tracker that utilizes a Mongo database to give a user the ability to track their workouts. The user will be able to vew previous workouts done, create new workouts they have just completed, and track their daily workouts with the combined weight and time through the stats page.

  • Live Link: Workout Tracker
  • Technologies Used: HTML, Javascript, Node.js, Express.js, Morgan, MongoDB, Mongoose
